"}]}]}], "detailedDescription_md": "The Haryana government has prepared a scheme to provide scholarship to the meritorious students of Scheduled Castes, Backward Classes, Nomadic, DNTs, Semi-Nomadic, Vimukt Jaati and Tapriwas Jaati of classes 11th to postgraduate level. It aims to produce a feeling of competition amongst them so that they can achieve great milestones in the field of education.
